name: Pokemon Insurgence
summary:
Meet the Torren region, a Pokemon land devastated by war and crime. Organization nicknamed as "Cults" run this region: they have the only purpose of adoring Pokemons in one way or another.

A man, called Agur, came to Torren and destroyed half of the cults, with only five remaining, before disappearing without a trace. Another man proclaim to follow the Agur's legacy and destroy the cults.

One year has passed. You wake up in the prison of the Darkrai Cult. Mew comes to your rescue.

You don't remember anything.

Made for Pokemon fans by Pokemon fans.
Aviable only until the 6th Gym.
